TEXT.TITLE: CARNIVAL CRUISE <CCL> TO REPURCHASE COMMON
TEXT.BODY: Carnival Cruise Lines said it may repourchase up to five mln of its Class A common shares, subject to market conditions. It said the decline in the market has made the stock an attractive investment. Carnival has about 132.2 mln shares outstanding. Reuter
